Gradle Document Converter Plugin 1.1.0

This Gradle plugin provides document conversion facilities in the form of Copy-like Gradle tasks.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
ru.myllyenko.gradle.plugins.documents.converter  

This Gradle plugin provides document conversion facilities in the form of Copy-like Gradle tasks.

Currently provided task types:

  • ru.myllyenko.gradle.plugins.documents.converter.MsWordToPdfConversionTask: converts Microsoft Word documents to PDF.

Release Notes

1.1.0 (2016-03-12)

  • The useLocalMsWord parameter is mandatory from now.
  • The MIT license has been replaced by GNU GPL.

1.0.0 (2016-03-07)

First version.
